channel.title: How do i make a server!?
channel.description:
I know most of them but there's still somethings confusing me here is what i know so far..
[b]download source[/b] > [b]extract to desktop[/b] > [b]click on folder[/b] > [b]double click run server[/b]...
But how do i make it hamachi? And also how do i start it out like log in, i no when it's hamachi on the ip address you write you hamachi "ip address".
[b]BRB IN A HOUR PLEASE KEEP POSTING[/b]

i already have all of that…

item.title: How do i make a server!?
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

1 - http://hamachi.cc

2 - download it

3 - install it

MAKING OWN CHANNEL

1 - click on the triangle in right corner

2 - click “create channel”

3 - full in info & click ok

LET PEOPLE JOIN YOUR SERVER VIA IT

1 - start up your server

2 - login on ham

3 - give people your channel + pass

4 - let them login on the ip next to your name

HAM TUT MADE BY ZENZIE

Read full topic
